lead_paragraph: Laura Lepisto of Finland won the women’s short program at Skate Canada in Quebec City, finishing with 59.18 points. Emily Hughes was second at 58.72, and the 17-year-old Mao Asada of Japan was third at 58.08. The free skate is today.
